properties.address: The Deal Centre, Kent CT14 6AG
properties.description: Step in from the cold with Age UK South Kent Coast's Warm Welcome. A warm space with access to free Wi-Fi, activities, support and a friendly welcome - whether you want to relax, work or grab a low cost bite to eat. Winter Warmer offer Join us on Fridays, November-March (except bank holidays) for our Winter Warmer offer: £4 two-course lunch and free hot drinks all day, call to book: 01304 372608
properties.title: The Deal Centre

properties.address: Turner Contemporary Gallery, Margate, Kent CT9 1HG
properties.description: Turner Contemporary is an art gallery built on the site of the boarding house where JMW Turner stayed during his visits to Margate, the gallery is inspired by the life and work of the celebrated artist, who found inspiration in the town’s skies and light and believed in the power of art as an agent for change. Visitors to Turner Contemporary can enjoy the latest art exhibition, take part in tours or activities, or use the learning space to relax and access the children's art library. The gallery also has a cafe, shop and toilets. Staff are on hand to welcome you, chat or help you engage with any of our offers. The gallery is free to access all year. Over the winter the gallery is open Wednesday to Sunday 10am until 5pm and you are welcome to stay as long as you want.
properties.title: Turner Contemporary
